venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Ever experienced healing energy? Looking for an inexpensive healing for an ailment? The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies will be hosting a Healing Clinic the third Sunday of every month from 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM. A warm and open environment where you can meet healers of varying techniques and skill levels, this is a great event to attend if you have never had a healing and are curious to see what it’s all about, or if you are seeking a healing for an ailment.

 

Also, if you are a healer and would like the opportunity to participate as a practitioner in a healing clinic, please contact us for further information on how to become a clinic healer. Attendance is By Donation, no need to register

 

KRI Center for Consciousness Studies is located at 1 Bayside Road, Unit 5, Greenland, NH 03840 ** The building is directly on the corner of 33 and Bayside. From the I-95, take exit 3 (95 northbound) or exit 3B (southbound) to Route 33 W. The Center will be 2.6 miles on the right, directly on the corner of 33 and Bayside, in the Gowen's Corner Plaza. The entrance is just to the left of Bayside Custon Frame & Mirror.
item.name: Healing Clinic
